```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
is_latex <- knitr::opts_knit$get('rmarkdown.pandoc.to') == 'latex'
library(huxtable)
```



# Basic Usage:

```{r}
ht_orig <- huxtable(a = letters[1:5], b = 10 ^ sample(1:5))
ht_orig$b <- formatC(ht_orig$b,  format = 'f', digits = 0)
width(ht_orig) <- 0.25
ht_orig <- set_all_borders(ht_orig, 1:nrow(ht_orig), 1:ncol(ht_orig), 1)
ht_orig
```



# Table Position:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
position(ht) <- 'left'
ht
```


# Replace NAs:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
ht[2,1] <- NA
ht
na_string(ht) <- '--'
ht
```

# Cell Alignment:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
align(ht)[,1] <- 'left'
ht
```

# Vertical Alignment:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
valign(ht)[,1] <- 'top'
ht
```

# Column Span:

```{r}

ht <- ht_orig
colspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht        
```

# Row Span:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
ht[1,1] <- 'A rather long block of text'
rowspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht        
```


# Row and Column Span:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
ht[1,1] <- 'A rather long block of text'
rowspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
colspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht        
```


# Table width:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
width(ht) <- 0.5
ht
```

# Column width:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
col_width(ht) <- c(.8, .2)
ht
```

# Borders:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
ht <- set_all_borders(ht, 1:5, 1:2, 0)
top_border(ht) <- c(2, 0, 0, 0, 1)
bottom_border(ht)[5,] <- 2 
ht
```



# Text color, bold, italic, font size

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
text_color(ht)[,2] <- 'red'
bold(ht)[1,] <- TRUE
italic(ht)[3,] <- TRUE
font_size(ht)[2,] <- 14
ht
```

# Background color:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
background_color(ht)[1,1] <- 'green'
background_color(ht)[,2] <- rgb(.4, .7, .6)
ht
```

# Background color, multirow:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
background_color(ht)[1,1] <- 'green'
rowspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht
```


# Background color, multicolumn:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
background_color(ht)[1,1] <- 'green'
colspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht
```

# Background color, multicolumn and multirow:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
background_color(ht)[1,1] <- 'green'
colspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
rowspan(ht)[1,1] <- 2
ht
```


# Caption:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
caption(ht) <- 'A simple table'
ht
```

# Caption below:

```{r}
ht <- ht_orig
caption(ht) <- 'A simple table'
caption_pos(ht) <- 'bottom'
ht
```
